adHeader: Web-based Time Tracking, Client Billing, Trust Accounting Software
adDetails: CaseFox is a cloud based easy to use software that is designed to help attorneys, CPAs and other professionals with their practice management, billing, invoicing, trust fund management, case management, client management, tracking billable time, non-billable time, expenses, payments, etc. CaseFox works on PC, MAC and tablets. CaseFox uses SSL for security and the most critical data in stored in the encrypted form in our databases. Full features basic plan is free. Please visit http://www.casefox.com or http://www.casefox.info for more details.
